title: Western Movie | The Hopefuls (1960) | Lorne Greene, Pernell Roberts, Dan Blocker  | Bonanza

sources.title: Western Movie | The Hopefuls (1960) | Lorne Greene, Pernell Roberts, Dan Blocker  | Bonanza
sources.description:
A Quaker woman convinces Adam to take her wagon train on a perilous journey west. He doesn't know that the woman's father has eyes on the gold that they are carrying to the promised land. Larry Gates, Patricia Donahue and Dennis Patrick guest star.
 
Director: James Neilson
Writer: E. Jack Neuman
Stars: Lorne Greene, Pernell Roberts, Dan Blocker 
Genres: Classics, Cult, TV, Western
